code: import React from"react";import Navbar from"./Navbar";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import ElectricButton from"./ElectricButton";import"./EventsInfoPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const eventsInfoPage=_ref=>{let{eventName,eventImgSrc,eventLink,eventRules,eventPrize,eventFile}=_ref;const rulesArray=eventRules.split('\n');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Events-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Events-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Events-info-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Events-info-main-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"Events-info-img",src:eventImgSrc,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:eventPrize}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:eventFile,download:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"Download-btn",children:["Brochure",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa fa-download","aria-hidden":"true"})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Events-info-main-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:eventName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Rules & Regulations:-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:rulesArray.map((rule,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"rules",children:rule},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Register",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:eventLink,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ElectricButton,{ButtonName:"Register"})})})]})]})})]})});};export default eventsInfoPage;
